about_the_game:
A missing body. A murdered professor. Five mysterious patients and a former femme fatale.

Play therapist and detective in a twisted Lovecraftian journey through the minds of six questionable suspects.

Will you save your patients or catch the killer? Or can you do both?

Whatever you decide, your assistant Marianna will always be there for you - unless she’s the killer of course…

  • SIMPLE UI - ask questions and respond to patients, watch replays and gather evidence 

  • EXPLORE - link answers together to progress 

  • MISSION TRACKER - your notepad keeps you updated 

  • MULTIPLE ENDINGS - multiple patient outcomes, player fates and killer endings 

  • NO SPOILERS - murderers are chosen at random when the game begins 

--

The 5th game from the creators of The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, The Shapeshifting Detective, Dark Nights with Poe and Munro, and Murderous Muses.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong psychological horror and adult themes including spoken references to suicide and drug and alcohol abuse. For a full list of content warnings please visit the website.

Play therapist and detective in a twisted Lovecraftian journey through the minds of six questionable suspects.

Will you save your patients or catch the killer? Or can you do both?

Whatever you decide, your assistant Marianna will always be there for you - unless she’s the killer of course…

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 64-bit
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3

name: The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or greater or equivalent
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An FMV game where YOU are a psychiatrist trying to solve a double murder whilst treating the unusual patients of the recently deceased Doctor Dekker. Ask questions and link answers to determine their fates, and your own!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
